subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Oh Bruce...
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1195150569
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Frank,
 
I listened to the demo on the mini box.  It sounds like pure gibberish  of 
simple radio signals.  I did not detect one intelligent thing in the 6  minute 
wave he posted.  And does everyone actually thing there re  "technicians" lined 
up on the other side just waiting to talk to us on our  side?  Some people 
may consider this just a toy and abuse.  What will  happen with all the negative 
energy and spirits that are released from people  just sitting there playing 
with the box?  Will the builder be responsible  for that?
 
Jeff
